Reviews.Title: Samsung Propel cell phone
Reviews.Author: jackie n
Reviews.Content: I Thought delivery was very fast.  I thought the price was very reasonable.  I bought it for my son.  He is very pleased.  He likes to text, it has music player, he can put appointments and alarms in it.  We are both pleased.

Reviews.Title: WORKS AND LOOKS GREAT
Reviews.Author: Kim
Reviews.Content: Though used it looks new and works great.I had a propel before and only replaced it after I dunked it for the 4th time.

Reviews.Title: Great for High School students or busy college students
Reviews.Author: lmonge23
Reviews.Content: It had everything that I needed and is sturdy to boot. Customizable arrows and menus, so I only put the applications that I need. Texting takes some gettting used to but is easy when you get the hang of it.

Reviews.Title: Great Service
Reviews.Author: Jonathan J Wagahoff
Reviews.Content: Great service. It wasn't quite what my wife wanted and they took it back with no issues. Again, great Service!!

Reviews.Title: Fast delivery
Reviews.Author: Tina Tepe
Reviews.Content: It is what it says, basic slider phone.  Both phones worked well when they arrived. We bought them for use with Consumer Cellular, they work for calls and texting, but cannot access the web with these phones on Consumer Cellular accounts, nor can we send and receive pictures with them. If you are looking for a simple, non complicated, slider phone.. this is the one for you :)

Reviews.Title: Great Phone/Nothing But Compliments This Way
Reviews.Author: Bre 'Ana Cooper
Reviews.Content: Had a phone just like this before I got swept up into the the world of smartphones but I've come back to old faithful. I love this phone and everything about it. Bought a refurbished one and it looked brand new and works like new as well and at a great price way better than on eBay (at least the ones I saw).

Reviews.Title: Pretty good phone for texting
Reviews.Author: JohnKes "John K."
Reviews.Content: It is a beautiful phone - I love the color.  My younger daughter loves it for calling and texting.  She also likes the 1.3 MP camera.  Delivery was fast, and it worked perfectly with AT&T;'s Go Phone SIM chip right out of the box.This is a 3G phone.  AT&T; is turning off their 2G system Jan 2013, so I had to replace my daughter's old 2G phone to keep up.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Kathy Moyer
Reviews.Content: I HAD A 767 before and spilled on it. I tried other phones but wasn't't HAPPY so I went to Amazon to see what was available for a prepaid and found my old phone but brand new, I love it.

Reviews.Title: Poor reception
Reviews.Author: L. Story
Reviews.Content: This is a nice phone,compact,easy to use and the keys are big enough to text easily.  My complaint is that I live in a very rural are an this phone gets terrible reception.  I will save it for my grandson who lives in town.

ProductInfo.Features:
This unlocked cell phone is compatible with GSM carriers like AT&T; and T-Mobile.
Slider phone with full QWERTY keyboard and dedicated messaging button for easy text and instant messaging
1.3-megapixel camera (with video capture); Bluetooth stereo music streaming; MicroSD memory expansion; access to personal email
Up to 5 hours of talk time, up to 240 hours (10 days) of standby time
What's in the Box: battery, charger,***NO MANUALl ***
ProductInfo.Name: Samsung Propel A767 Unlocked Phone with QWERTY Keyboard, 3G Support, 1.3MP Camera, Stereo Bluetooth and Music Player-Red
